org.opensaml
Class SAMLConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.opensaml.SAMLConfig
public class SAMLConfig
extends java.lang.Object

OpenSAML configuration bundle. Implemented as a singleton.

Author:
Walter Hoehn (wassa@columbia.edu)
